properties.name: webpage.indexing.interval
properties.description: Interval for next URLs batch indexing in ISO duration format.

properties.name: webpage.indexing.urls
properties.description: First URLs to add to database, from them starts the first indexing process.

properties.name: webpage.indexing.urlstoindex
properties.description: Number of URLs to index in each scheduled batch

properties.name: webpage.indexing.interrupt
properties.description: Whether to interrupt or not the running indexing processes

properties.name: webpage.page-size
properties.description: Number or results to return from a search
